definitions: Presents (someone or something) to another for the first time.
Brings (something, especially a new product, idea, or system) into use or operation for the first time.
Inserts or adds (something) into a place or context.
Precedes (a piece of music or writing) with an introductory section.
examples: She introduces her new colleague to the team.
The company introduces a new line of smartphones every year.
The author introduces a complex theme early in the novel.
The orchestra introduces the main melody with a soft string section.
